member.name: M:Connectivity.Plugin.ConnectivityImplementation.IsReachable(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if remote is reachable. RT apps cannot do loopback so this will alway return false. You can use it to check remote calls though.

member.name: M:Connectivity.Plugin.ConnectivityImplementation.IsRemoteReachable(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Tests if a remote host name is reachable
member.param: Host name can be a remote IP or URL of website (no http:// or www.)
Port to attempt to check is reachable.

member.name: P:Connectivity.Plugin.ConnectivityImplementation.IsConnected
member.summary: Gets if there is an active internet connection

member.name: P:Connectivity.Plugin.ConnectivityImplementation.ConnectionTypes
member.summary: Gets the list of all active connection types.

member.name: P:Connectivity.Plugin.ConnectivityImplementation.Bandwidths
member.summary: Retrieves a list of available bandwidths for the platform. Only active connections.
